text: Hexaplex erythrostomus is a species of gastropod.World Registe of Marine Species Hexaplex erythrostomus (Swainson, 1831) AphiaID: 596187 ==Distribution== Hexaplex erythrostomus are found from the West Coast of the United States to Peru.Baqueiro Cardenas, Erick. y Aldana Aranda, Dalila. 2003:Patrones en la biología poblacional de moluscos de importancia comercial en México.
